11:I[28398,["/_next/static/chunks/336a942e6ebf3183.js","/_next/static/chunks/d568515730fc15cf.js","/_next/static/chunks/9a745956972e37d4.js"],"default"]
:HL["/_next/static/chunks/6cef0e87a1eeed56.css","style"]
:HL["/_next/static/media/345c85a432359eed-s.p.eead68dd.woff2","font",{"crossOrigin":"","type":"font/woff2"}]

2:T428,
                (function() {
                                function getInitialTheme() {
                                  const stored = localStorage.getItem("theme-color-scheme");
                                  if (stored) {
                                    return stored;
                                  }
                                  const userMedia = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
                                  if (userMedia.matches) {
                                    return 'dark';
                                  }
                                  return 'light';
                                }
                                const theme = getInitialTheme();
                                if (theme === 'dark') {
                                  document.documentElement.classList.add('dark');
                                } else {
                                  document.documentElement.classList.remove('dark');
                                }
                              })();

I finally launched my wedding invitations\nwebsite where my guests will be able to confirm if they are coming or not, but\nalso to choose if they need some accommodations (like vegetarian food, or if\nthey need a hotel room)."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"overview","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#overview","children":"Overview"}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"In this section we will look at the flow of the application, and in the\nfollowing sections, we will analyze in more technical depth how I've\nimplemented some features of the website."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"We have two different screens that a guest can see, depending on how I was able\nto invite him:"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["If the user was invited online without a physical invitation, he will receive\na link of the following form: ",["$","code",null,{"children":"website-link.com/invite/[INVITE_CODE]"}],". 29:["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","code",null,{"children":"api"}]," - to handle all the APIs of the website;"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","code",null,{"children":"storage"}]," - to handle the storage;"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":[["$","code",null,{"children":"web"}]," - to handle the general pages of the website."]}],"\n"]}]
2a:["$","h3",null,{"id":"the-storage-package","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#the-storage-package","children":["The ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage"}]," package"]}]}]
2b:["$","p",null,{"children":["I will start by talking about the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage"}]," package, as I think that is the most\ninteresting one."]}]
2c:["$","p",null,{"children":["In ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage/invitation.go"}]," I'm defining the struct for the invitation, but\nI also added a method to the struct called ",["$","code",null,{"children":"GetDifference"}]," that receives another\ninvitation as a pointer and will return a string with the differences between\nthe structs. This function comes in handy as I output to the log file when a\nchange is made by the user to see that everything is good and works as\nexpected."]}]

"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"string"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":" ="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" \"\""}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"    if"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" e.GSheetRowIndex }"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" 2e:["$","p",null,{"children":["After I've defined the structure of the invitation, I've created\n",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage/invitationsJSONStorage.go"}]," that will just define methods\nfor loading and saving the invitations to the JSON file."]}]
2f:["$","p",null,{"children":["And now comes ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage/invitationsGSheetStorage.go"}],", that is\nresponsible for storing and getting the data from Google\nSpreadsheet."]}]

32:["$","p",null,{"children":"To make changes to the spreadsheet, I was required to setup a service account\non Google Cloud Console. After creating it, we store in the master configuration\nfile the email, account key ID and the key of the service account. The last thing\nto do is to invite the service account to the spreadsheet and give him\nthe required permissions to make changes to it."}]

38:["$","p",null,{"children":["While I define more methods in the file, I will only present the method responsible for\nupdating an invitation in the spreadsheet. The method creates an ",["$","code",null,{"children":"interface"}],"\nwith the data for the spreadsheet's row, and then, using the invitation's\n",["$","code",null,{"children":"GSheetRowIndex"}]," (that stores the row index of the invitation in the spreadsheet),\nI update that row."]}]
39:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"go","data-theme":"github-light "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"    var"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" vr append"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"(vr.Values, data)"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    _, err "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":":="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" e.instance.Spreadsheets.Values."}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"Update"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"(e.spreadsheetID, "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":"\"A\""}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":" +"}],"$L8d","$L8e","$L8f","$L90","$L91","$L92","$L93","$L94","$L95","$L96","$L97"]}],"\n","$L98","\n","$L99","\n","$L9a","\n","$L9b","\n","$L9c","\n","$L9d","\n","$L9e","\n","$L9f"]}]}]}]
3a:["$","p",null,{"children":["In the final part of the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage"}]," package section, I want to talk about the\nmain \"class\" that takes the above storages and uses them for storing the data."]}]
3b:["$","p",null,{"children":"While there are many methods in this structure, I want only to showcase how the\nupdating of an invitation is done, which I think is the most interesting part\nof all."}]
3c:["$","p",null,{"children":["First, we have the method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"UpdateInvitation"}]," that takes a pointer to an ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Invitation"}],"\nstruct, checks if the code of the invitation exists (otherwise throws an error), and\nthen updates the invitation and calls the method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"startTimerToUpdateChanges"}]," which\nis responsible for saving the changes to the JSON file and the spreadsheet."]}]
3d:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"go","data-theme":"github-light "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    e.invitations[index] e."}],"$La0","$La1"]}],"\n","$La2","\n","$La3","\n","$La4"]}]}]}]
3e:["$","p",null,{"children":["The method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"startTimerToUpdateChanges"}]," will not update straight-forward the\nchanges to the JSON file and the spreadsheet (as the name implies). This is\nbecause the API for Google Spreadsheet implies some rates, and I did not want\nto exceed those rates, so the method will start a countdown timer that, when\nit expires, will save the changes. While the timer is still not expired, all the\nrequired invitations that need to be updated are saved in an array of codes of\ninvitations."]}]
3f:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"go","data-theme":"github-light 40:["$","p",null,{"children":["The method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"saveOnTimerEnd"}]," is the true one responsible for saving the changes.\nThe code for it is quite simple:"]}]
41:["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["calculate the new hash; (read ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#sync","children":"here"}]," for more about it)"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"clone the array of codes of the invitations that have changes so we can reset\nit in case new updates come;"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["save the changes to the JSON file using the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"InvitationsJSONStorage"}],"\nstructure;"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["go to each code and try to update it in the Google Spreadsheet:","\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"if the update fails, then sleep for 5 seconds before retrying;"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"try for maximum 3 times;"}],"\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"if all the rows were updated successfully, then try to update the hash\nwith the new one generated for maximum 3 times."}],"\n"]}]

43:["$","p",null,{"children":["This is pretty much the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage"}]," package. While the package still contains\nmore functionalities, I will not go over them as they are quite generic and not\nthat interesting."]}]
44:["$","h3",null,{"id":"the-api-package","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#the-api-package","children":["The ",["$","code",null,{"children":"api"}]," package"]}]}]
45:["$","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$","code",null,{"children":"api"}]," package contains all the APIs for the project. Nothing really\ninteresting in this package."]}]
46:["$","p",null,{"children":["I have some admin requests, where in order to check if the requester is\nauthorized to do those operations, I created the function ",["$","code",null,{"children":"IsAdmin"}],":"]}]
47:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"go","data-theme":"github-light 48:["$","p",null,{"children":["This function will use the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"storage/sessionsStorage"}]," structure, that is a\nsimple structure with an array of ",["$","code",null,{"children":"Session"}],"s (a structure with an ",["$","code",null,{"children":"id"}]," as ",["$","code",null,{"children":"string"}],"\nand a ",["$","code",null,{"children":"expireTime"}]," as ",["$","code",null,{"children":"time.Time"}],"). The method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"CheckSession"}]," does the\nfollowing: check if the session exists, if exists check if the time has not\nexpired, and, if expired, will delete it and return the error, otherwise, will\nadd 10 minutes to the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"expireTime"}],"."]}]

52:["$","p",null,{"children":["One thing that is done for every route that a guest could reach is saving the\ninvitation code in a cookie named ",["$","code",null,{"children":"invitation_code"}],". This way, when a guest\ncomes back to the website, I will check if the cookie exists and redirect\nthe user to the required screen."]}]
53:["$","p",null,{"children":["Let's look at the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"/"}]," route:"]}]

55:["$","p",null,{"children":["The route is very simple: we create the HTML template with the given title and\nscript name, and in the request I check if the cookie for the invitation's code\nis set, and if it is, I redirect the user to the \"logged\" page by redirecting to\n",["$","code",null,{"children":"/c/[INVITE_CODE]"}],", otherwise serve the welcome page."]}]
56:["$","p",null,{"children":["A more interesting route would be the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"/c/[INVITE_CODE]"}]," route."]}]
57:["$","p",null,{"children":["For this route, I keep the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"<!-- EXTRA_CODE -->"}]," inside the template because for\neach request, I create a template where I inject as a JavaScript script the data\nof the invitation. This way, can serve directly all the data required for\nrendering the page without the need to add an additional request for retrieving\nthe invitation data and also without needing to implement a loading screen."]}]

"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    jsonEncoded, err 59:["$","p",null,{"children":["The method ",["$","code",null,{"children":"utils.checkRouteInviteCode"}]," checks the invitation's code on all the\nroutes that require it and will automatically redirect the user to the welcome\nscreen and display an error about it."]}]
5a:["$","h2",null,{"id":"the-front-end","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#the-front-end","children":"The front-end"}]}]
5b:["$","p",null,{"children":"The front-end was done using SolidJS. It has 5 entry points. One for each\nscreen section, the last one being for the admin dashboard."}]
5c:["$","p",null,{"children":"I also used TailwindCSS for fast styling of the pages and TypeScript for a better\nJavaScript experience."}]
5d:["$","p",null,{"children":"The design was made to be fully responsive, with a focus on the mobile\nexperience, because I'm pretty sure 99% of the invited people will access the\nwebsite from a mobile device."}]
5e:["$","p",null,{"children":"For the bundling of the SolidJS code, I used rollup.js as it was simple to use.\nHere is the configuration file I used for bundling using rollup.js. The config\nis able to compile all my entry points, each one in an output name with the\nsame name, so the back-end knows how to load it."}]

'@rollup/plugin-commonjs'"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"import"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" postcss "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"from"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" 'rollup-plugin-postcss'"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":";"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"import"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" tailwindcss "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"from"}],"$L17f"]}],"\n","$L180","\n","$L181","\n","$L182","\n","$L183","\n","$L184","\n","$L185","\n","$L186","\n","$L187","\n","$L188","\n","$L189","\n","$L18a","\n","$L18b","\n","$L18c","\n","$L18d","\n","$L18e","\n","$L18f","\n","$L190","\n","$L191","\n","$L192","\n","$L193","\n","$L194","\n","$L195","\n","$L196","\n","$L197","\n","$L198","\n","$L199","\n","$L19a","\n","$L19b","\n","$L19c","\n","$L19d","\n","$L19e","\n","$L19f","\n","$L1a0","\n","$L1a1","\n","$L1a2","\n","$L1a3","\n","$L1a4","\n","$L1a5","\n","$L1a6","\n","$L1a7","\n","$L1a8","\n","$L1a9","\n","$L1aa","\n","$L1ab","\n","$L1ac","\n","$L1ad","\n","$L1ae","\n","$L1af","\n","$L1b0","\n","$L1b1","\n","$L1b2","\n","$L1b3","\n","$L1b4","\n","$L1b5","\n","$L1b6","\n","$L1b7"]}]}]}]
60:["$","p",null,{"children":"Beside this, there is nothing that interesting on the front-end side of the\nproject."}]
61:["$","h2",null,{"id":"sync","children":"Synchronization mechanism for the stored data"}]
62:["$","p",null,{"children":"While I've already explained how and where I store the data for the invitations,\nI want to talk about how I do the synchronization between the JSON file and the\nspreadsheet. While the JSON file that is stored on the server has fewer changes\nof being modified manually, the spreadsheet is much easier to be modified\nmanually by mistake (I make sure that only the service account has the right\nto make changes to the spreadsheet, but who knows?). So I needed to introduce some\nsynchronization mechanisms."}]
63:["$","p",null,{"children":"Because of this, I created a simple synchronization mechanism that stores in the\nA1 cell a hash that is calculated from the concatenated data of all the\nsettings of the invitations."}]
64:["$","p",null,{"children":"Every time a change is made to the invitations, the new hash is calculated and\nuploaded to the spreadsheet along with the changes."}]
65:["$","p",null,{"children":"When the app starts, the hash is checked, and if it does not match the content loaded\nfrom the JSON file, then the app crashes."}]
66:["$","h2",null,{"id":"hosting-the-application","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#hosting-the-application","children":"Hosting the application"}]}]
67:["$","p",null,{"children":"The first thing I did when I thought of creating this app was to buy the domain to\nbe sure that nobody else would take it until the app was done and ready to be\npublished. So I bought it, but RoTLD (because only they can sell .ro domains)\noffers no DNS capabilities."}]
68:["$","p",null,{"children":"In the search for a free DNS, I stumbled upon CloudFlare and their free offer.\nIt was more than enough and also included some caching features for my website\nto run faster."}]
69:["$","p",null,{"children":["Now that I had the domain and a DNS server, I bought a cheap VPS from a local\ncompany that offered me ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"1 vCore"}],", ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"2 GB RAM"}]," and ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"20GB ROM"}]," at a\nmaximum bandwidth of ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"100 Mb/s"}]," for ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"8.9â¬ per month"}],". It's quite a good deal\nbecause I know they offer good services with no downtime."]}]
6a:["$","p",null,{"children":["I booted on it ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"Debian"}],", and because I didn't want to go the route of\ncreating a Docker image for each release, I've gone the route of\ncloning and then pulling the changes from the git repository containing the\nproject."]}]
6b:["$","p",null,{"children":"So I created the following script:"}]
6c:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-light github-dark","children":["$","code",null,{"data-line-numbers":"","data-language":"bash","data-theme":"github-light github-dark","style":{"display":"grid"},"data-line-numbers-max-digits":"1","children":[["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"#!/bin/bash"}]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"cd"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" /home/user/and-wedding-invitations"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"git"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" pull"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"cd"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" server"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"go"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" build"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" -o"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" /home/user/server"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" main/main.go"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"sudo"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" systemctl"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" restart"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" and-wedding-invitations"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"echo"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" \"Done\""}]]}]]}]}]}]
6d:["$","p",null,{"children":["The script pulls the changes from git, then I build the ",["$","code",null,{"children":"go"}]," application\nand simply restart the created service. The compiled files for the front-end\nare already stored in the git repository."]}]
6e:["$","p",null,{"children":"Because I wanted the app to restart at every crash and to start if the VPS\nwould be rebooted for some reason or had any downtime, I created a service:"}]
6f:["$","figure",null,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"","children":["$","pre",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292e","--shiki-dark":"#e1e4e8","--shiki-light-bg":"#fff","--shiki-dark-bg":"#24292e"},"tabIndex":"0","data-language":"toml","data-theme":"github-light github-dark","children":["$","code",null,{"data-line-numbers":"","data-language":"toml","data-theme":"github-light "}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"["}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"Service"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"]"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"Type=s"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#B31D28","--shiki-light-font-style":"italic","--shiki-dark":"#FDAEB7","--shiki-dark-font-style":"italic"},"children":"imple"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"ExecStart=/"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#B31D28","--shiki-light-font-style":"italic","--shiki-dark":"#FDAEB7","--shiki-dark-font-style":"italic"},"children":"home/user/server"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"Environment="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":"\"CONFIG_PATH=/home/user/config.and-wedding-invitations.json\""}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"Restart=o"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#B31D28","--shiki-light-font-style":"italic","--shiki-dark":"#FDAEB7","--shiki-dark-font-style":"italic"},"children":"n-failure"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"RestartSec="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"5"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#B31D28","--shiki-light-font-style":"italic","--shiki-dark":"#FDAEB7","--shiki-dark-font-style":"italic"},"children":"s"}]]}],"\n",["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"StandardOutput=a"}],"$L1b8"]}],"\n","$L1b9","\n","$L1ba","\n","$L1bb","\n","$L1bc"]}]}]}]
70:["$","h2",null,{"id":"final-word","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#final-word","children":"Final word"}]}]
71:["$","p",null,{"children":"I'm waiting to see how my guests will react to the application and how\nmany of them will be using it."}]
72:["$","p",null,{"children":"I will soon publish a link to the repository for anyone who is interested in\nthe full code of the project."}]

7a:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" "}]

7c:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" "}]
7d:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6A737D","--shiki-dark":"#6A737D"},"children":"    // Create a service object for Google sheets"}]}]
7e:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    instance, err "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":":="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" sheets."}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"NewService"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"(oauth2.NoContext, option."}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"WithHTTPClient"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"(client))"}]]}]
7f:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"    if"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" err "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"!="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":" nil"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" {"}]]}]
80:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"        log."}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"Fatalf"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"("}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":"\"[GSheetStorage:Setup][E] Unable to retrieve Sheets client: "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"%v"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":"\""}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":", err)"}]]}]
81:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    }"}]}]
82:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":" "}]
83:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    e.instance "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"="}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" instance"}]]}]
84:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"}"}]}]
85:["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"=="}]

87:["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" {"}]
88:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"        return"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":" \"\""}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":", errors."}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#6F42C1","--shiki-dark":"#B392F0"},"children":"New"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"("}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#032F62","--shiki-dark":"#9ECBFF"},"children":"\"No value\""}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":")"}]]}]
89:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    } "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"else"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" {"}]]}]
8a:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":[["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"        return"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":" resp.Values["}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"0"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"]["}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"0"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"].("}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#D73A49","--shiki-dark":"#F97583"},"children":"string"}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"), "}],["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#005CC5","--shiki-dark":"#79B8FF"},"children":"nil"}]]}]
8b:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"    }"}]}]
8c:["$","span",null,{"data-line":"","children":["$","span",null,{"style":{"--shiki-light":"#24292E","--shiki-dark":"#E1E4E8"},"children":"}"}]}]
